pre.intro: You enter yet another mysterious dungeon, god knows what awaits this time.
pre.lore: As you venture deeper you notice the air in this dungeon feels much stronger than the outside world. Suddenly you're assured by a mysterious voice that it is nothing to worry about...

green_saibaman.name: Green Saibaman
green_saibaman.dialogue: A human? Get ready to become fertilizer!
green_saibaman.success_dialogue: With a swift blow, the Saibaman is defeated. As you continue, a different enemy emerges from the shadows...
green_saibaman.failure_dialogue: The Saibaman explodes, taking you with it! You have been defeated.

choices.text: Attack its Jaw
Kick its Side
Bite it

blue_cell.name: Blue Cell
blue_cell.dialogue: Hehehe, you're not getting past me BLEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEH!
blue_cell.success_dialogue: You decided to ignore the Cell and it decided not to follow. But it seems there's someone much more powerful waiting.
blue_cell.failure_dialogue: The Cell Jr. jumps and absorbs you! You have been defeated.

choices.text: Attack its Jaw
Ignore and Carry on

raditz.name: Raditz
raditz.dialogue: A human? Kneel before the Saiyan Race! OH? Your power level is quite high..let's see if you can keep up! Raditz suddenly starts running around the room.
raditz.riddle_dialogue: A strange voice appears and says 'O' Young Shinobi, This foe isn't about your strength. It is about your minds, now answer carefully.'
raditz.question: What will you do?
raditz.failure_dialogue: Raditz outsmarts you by using his speed to confuse you and land a vital blow. You have been defeated.

choices.text: Run for dear life
Stand There
Try to keep up with Raditz

raditz_enraged.name: Angry Raditz
raditz_enraged.dialogue: IMPOSSIBLE! You stood your ground against my speed? Fine! Let's see how you handle this!

pre.intro: The air thickens with a malevolent chakra. You've entered the dreaded Forest of Death.
pre.lore: You see a massive, slithering figure in the trees. Itâ€™s Orochimaru, and he's not happy about your presence. You'll need to outsmart him to survive.

orochimaru.name: Orochimaru
orochimaru.dialogue: Fascinating... an insect has wandered into my web. Do you have what it takes to escape?
orochimaru.question: The forest is a maze of jutsu. Which path will you take to find the scroll?
orochimaru.riddle_dialogue: A whisper in the trees says, 'The path to true power lies where the shadows meet the sun.'

choices.text: Go towards the brightest light
choices.failure_dialogue: A genjutsu! You've walked into a trap. Orochimaru's curse mark activates, and you feel your life force draining away.

choices.text: Search for a dark cave
choices.failure_dialogue: You enter a dark cave only to be met by a swarm of poisonous snakes. You have been defeated.

choices.text: Follow the trail of discarded ninja tools
choices.success_dialogue: You find a trail of discarded kunai and shuriken, leading you straight to the scroll. But as you grab it, a giant snake emerges...

mandarin_snake.name: Mandarin Snake
mandarin_snake.dialogue: SSSSSSS. I protect this scroll. You shall not pass!

pre.intro: The sky darkens as massive, metallic pillars fall from the heavens. Pain has arrived.
pre.lore: You stand before the leader of the Akatsuki. His Rinnegan eyes stare into your soul. You know this is a fight you can't win with just brute force.

pain.name: Pain
pain.dialogue: So you have come to face me. Your futile efforts will only lead to one outcome: Shinra Tensei!

pre.intro: A desolate battlefield stretches before you, filled with reanimated shinobi. The Fourth Great Ninja War is upon you.
pre.lore: You must navigate the chaos and face down two of the most powerful shinobi to ever live: Kabuto and Madara Uchiha.

kabuto_yakushi.name: Kabuto Yakushi
kabuto_yakushi.dialogue: I've perfected the Edo Tensei. Now, you will face an army of the dead. It's time to see what you're really made of.

choices.text: Try to defeat the entire army
choices.failure_dialogue: You're quickly overwhelmed by the sheer number of reanimated ninja. You are defeated.

choices.text: Find and attack Kabuto directly
choices.success_dialogue: You cut through the horde and manage to find Kabuto. As you land a blow, a familiar, terrifying chakra explodes from behind you.

madara_uchiha.name: Madara Uchiha
madara_uchiha.dialogue: My Edo Tensei is nothing compared to my true power. Let's see if you can dance with the true Uchiha.

pre.intro: You arrive at a small island with a large, intimidating fortress. The symbol of a saw-like jaw is painted on the walls. You've found Arlong Park.
pre.lore: You must navigate the brutal Arlong Pirates to free the town of Cocoyashi from their tyranny.

hatchan.name: Hatchan
hatchan.dialogue: Hahaha! You've made it this far, but you won't get past me! I'm the mighty Hatchan, master of Six-Sword Style!

choices.text: Fight him head-on
choices.failure_dialogue: Hatchan's six swords are too much for you to handle. You are defeated.

choices.text: Bait him into breaking his own swords
choices.success_dialogue: You trick Hatchan into a clumsy lunge, causing him to break his own swords. He is defeated, and now you face the main force of the Arlong Pirates.

arlong.name: Arlong
arlong.dialogue: Hmph! You defeated Hatchan? It doesn't matter. I'm stronger than any human. You're nothing but trash to a fish-man!

dungeons.name: My Hero Academia: Shie Hassaikai Raid

pre.intro: A quiet, foreboding compound stands before you. You are part of the raid on the Shie Hassaikai.
pre.lore: The heroes' mission is to rescue Eri and stop Overhaul. You'll need to work together to defeat the Yakuza and their powerful quirks.

gentle_criminal.name: Gentle Criminal
gentle_criminal.dialogue: La Brava, my dear! We'll show these uncultured heroes the art of true villainy!
gentle_criminal.puzzle_dialogue: Gentle Criminal uses his quirk to make the floor bouncy, and you start bouncing uncontrollably. You need to find a way to stabilize yourself.
gentle_criminal.question: Which item will you use to keep your feet on the ground?
gentle_criminal.failure_dialogue: You try to use a rope, but it's no use. You bounce right out of the building. You have been defeated.
gentle_criminal.success_dialogue: You grab a heavy weight from your pack and throw it to the floor. The weight negates the bouncy quirk, allowing you to move forward.

overhaul_kai_chisaki.name: Overhaul
overhaul_kai_chisaki.dialogue: Don't touch me. You're filthy. I'll disassemble you and show you the 'true' power of my quirk.

pre.intro: The streets of Shibuya are filled with curses and chaos. The most dangerous night in Jujutsu history has begun.
pre.lore: You're caught in the middle of a war between sorcerers and cursed spirits. You'll need to be at your best to survive the night.

hanami.name: Hanami
hanami.dialogue: We will cleanse this world of humans. You're an obstacle.
hanami.dialogue_text: Hanami's power is tied to the fear of nature. You need to find the right words to weaken it.
hanami.question: What will you say to the cursed spirit?

choices.text: Tell it how beautiful the city is
choices.success_dialogue: Hanami's rage flares, but your words of praise for the artificial world weaken its resolve. It is defeated, but another foe appears.

choices.text: Threaten it with a powerful attack
choices.failure_dialogue: Your threat only strengthens its resolve. The cursed spirit unleashes a barrage of trees and you are defeated.

pre.intro: A gloomy, rain-soaked cave stands before you. This is the Akatsuki's hideout.
pre.lore: You've been tasked with infiltrating the hideout and retrieving a stolen scroll. You'll need to be stealthy and clever to get past the notorious duo of Itachi Uchiha and Kisame Hoshigaki.

kisame_hoshigaki.name: Kisame Hoshigaki
kisame_hoshigaki.dialogue: A little fish has swum into the shark's den. Let's see if you can handle the monster of the mist!

choices.text: Engage him in a water battle
choices.failure_dialogue: Kisame's Samehada drains your chakra in an instant. You've been defeated.

choices.text: Try to bypass him with a fire jutsu
choices.success_dialogue: You manage to create enough steam with a powerful fire jutsu to blind him, allowing you to slip past. You hear Itachi's voice behind you.

itachi_uchiha.name: Itachi Uchiha
itachi_uchiha.dialogue: You've proven your worth by getting past my partner. Now, let's see if your will can withstand the gaze of the Mangekyou Sharingan.

pre.intro: The mission to the Land of Waves should have been simple, but now you're facing a rogue ninja known as the Demon of the Hidden Mist.
pre.lore: You and your team must protect the bridge builder and face down Zabuza Momochi and his young apprentice, Haku.

zabuza_momochi.name: Zabuza Momochi
zabuza_momochi.dialogue: So, you've decided to get in my way, brat? You'll regret it!

choices.text: Rush him with a frontal assault
choices.failure_dialogue: You are easily caught in a water prison jutsu. Zabuza laughs as he defeats you.

choices.text: Try to use the surrounding mist to your advantage
choices.success_dialogue: You disappear into the mist, confusing Zabuza and forcing him to retreat. But another figure appears in the mist, ready to fight.

haku.name: Haku
haku.dialogue: I'm sorry, but I can't let you pass.

pre.intro: The final stage of the Chunin Exams is about to begin. You stand in the arena, ready to fight.
pre.lore: You'll face off against some of the strongest genin in the world, including the Sand Village's most dangerous weapon.

rock_lee.name: Rock Lee
rock_lee.dialogue: My goal is to prove that hard work can beat natural talent. Let's see what you've got!

choices.text: Use a jutsu to attack him from a distance
choices.failure_dialogue: Rock Lee's speed is too great! He dodges your jutsu and lands a decisive blow. You have been defeated.

choices.text: Engage him in a taijutsu fight
choices.success_dialogue: You manage to keep up with his movements, and he decides to use his final move to test you. You pass, and he collapses.

gaara.name: Gaara
gaara.dialogue: I am the monster of the sand. Now, die.

pre.intro: A colossal footstep shakes the ground as the gates of Wall Maria are breached. The Titans have come.
pre.lore: You must protect the citizens and fight alongside the Survey Corps to seal the wall.

choices.text: Attack its nape
choices.success_dialogue: You make a clean strike to the nape, and the Titan falls. You turn to face the next threat.

choices.text: Try to reason with it
choices.failure_dialogue: The Titan ignores your words and takes a bite out of you. You have been defeated.

armin_arlert.name: Armin Arlert
armin_arlert.dialogue: We need to get to the cannon! We'll hold them off!
armin_arlert.dialogue_text: Armin is panicking. You need to say the right thing to calm him down and make a plan.
armin_arlert.question: What will you say to Armin?

choices.text: We'll get through this!
choices.failure_dialogue: Your words do nothing to calm him, and he falls into a panic. You are left to fight alone and are quickly overwhelmed.

choices.text: Let's focus on one thing at a time. What's the plan?
choices.success_dialogue: Your words calm him, and he lays out a brilliant plan to defeat the Titans. With his guidance, you make it through.

pre.intro: The Mugen Train rumbles down the tracks, and you're part of the team investigating the disappearances on board.
pre.lore: You and the Hashira Kyojuro Rengoku must fight against the Lower Rank One demon, Enmu, who has the ability to manipulate dreams.

enmu_lower_one.name: Enmu
enmu_lower_one.dialogue: Sleep now, and have a beautiful dream...
enmu_lower_one.puzzle_dialogue: You fall into a deep sleep. Your dream is an endless, beautiful field. You need to find a way to break free from the dream.
enmu_lower_one.question: Which item will you use to break free?
enmu_lower_one.failure_dialogue: You try to use your sword, but it is just part of the dream. You are trapped forever.
enmu_lower_one.success_dialogue: You realize that the only way to break free is to do something painful. You cut your own throat in the dream and awaken, ready to fight!

akaza_upper_three.name: Akaza
akaza_upper_three.dialogue: Kyojuro, you and your little friend. Become demons and you can fight me forever!

pre.intro: The Heavens Arena looms high above you, a tower where fighters test their strength and skill.
pre.lore: You've entered the 200th floor, where Nen users reside. You'll have to face some of the strongest people in the world.

hisoka.name: Hisoka
hisoka.dialogue: My, my, what a delicious little fruit you are. Are you ripe enough to fight?
hisoka.dialogue_text: Hisoka is looking for a good fight. You need to say the right thing to either fight him or get away.
hisoka.question: What will you say to Hisoka?

choices.text: I'm a little rusty, maybe next time.
choices.success_dialogue: Hisoka laughs and says, 'A clever one! The chase is half the fun.' He lets you pass, intrigued by your lack of fear.

choices.text: I'm ready to fight! Bring it on!
choices.failure_dialogue: Hisoka's eyes gleam with malice. 'A foolish choice, little fruit.' He pummels you into the ground. You are defeated.

gon_and_killua.name: Gon and Killua
gon_and_killua.dialogue: We're here to test our strength. We're not holding back!

pre.intro: You stand in the Land of Iron, where the Five Kage have gathered for a historic summit.
pre.lore: Sasuke Uchiha has crashed the meeting, seeking revenge on his brother's killer. You must fight your way through the samurai guards and face him.

samurai_guards.name: Samurai Guards
samurai_guards.dialogue: Intruder! You will not get past us!

choices.text: Try to talk your way past them
choices.failure_dialogue: They don't listen to your pleas and attack. You are defeated.

choices.text: Fight them with taijutsu
choices.success_dialogue: You manage to defeat the samurai guards, but a familiar face awaits you.

sasuke_uchiha.name: Sasuke Uchiha
sasuke_uchiha.dialogue: I have no time for weaklings. Get out of my way.

pre.intro: You find a hidden underground hideout, a place of immense power and secrets.
pre.lore: You enter the hideout of Madara Uchiha. You must navigate the tunnels and face him to prove your strength.

madara_uchiha_final.name: Madara Uchiha
madara_uchiha_final.dialogue: Hmph, a foolish mortal has come to challenge me. Let's see if you can withstand my Susanoo.

pre.intro: The battlefield shakes as the monstrous Ten-Tails is reanimated. Its raw power is immense.
pre.lore: You must work with the entire Shinobi Alliance to stop Obito Uchiha from casting the Infinite Tsukuyomi.

obito_uchiha.name: Obito Uchiha
obito_uchiha.dialogue: This is the final stage. The world will be united under my Infinite Tsukuyomi.

choices.text: Talk to him and try to convince him to change his ways
choices.success_dialogue: Your words get through to him, reminding him of his past and the friends he's lost. He hesitates, giving you an opening.

choices.text: Attack him with a powerful jutsu
choices.failure_dialogue: He phases right through your attack, and you're caught in a genjutsu. You are defeated.

madara_reanimated.name: Reanimated Madara
madara_reanimated.dialogue: Hmph, a foolish mortal has come to challenge me. Let's see if you can withstand my Susanoo.
